title: Shroud of Turin and Miracles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/26/18
itunes:title: Shroud of Turin and Miracles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/26/18
description:
George Noory and paranormal skeptic Joe Nickell discuss the Shroud of Turin, which many people believe shows an image of Jesus but Nickel believes is a forgery, as well using science to disprove many instances of miracles and religious faith.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
